metadata.name: FACTORY
metadata.description:
The FACTORY of big dreams


Performed by Celzidor Andrei and Nicolas Putzolu
Visuals by Paweł Wilkos
Song: Dazo L'oizeau - NI
1/1 art

Welcome to our FACTORY where we create, motivate and always find inspiration. This place is somewhere deep inside us and you.
SOUND ON!


"Your mind is like a factory"
It is a busy place, producing countless thoughts in one day. Let your thoughts create the reality that you want to see in your life. Give yourself space to think.

In April 2022 I invited Nico to Warsaw, Poland for this dance NFT project and, with the help of Paweł, we reached in the outskirts of the capital a very big (and abandoned) factory which inspired us and our dance moves very much.
It was really cold but dancing electro is always helpful in this kind of situation :)

Bonus content:
The winner of the auction will get "behind-the-scenes" footage as a gift and a high-resolution video file.


#electrodance #danceNFT #celzidor #nico #NFT #factory #danceNFTs #dancer #dancers #airburner
